channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside 64 baker street opposite Tesco, 25th June
item.description:
Bags of rubbish and 1 first mile bag need to clear out from pavement outside 64 Baker street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Baker Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive litter and clothing fly tipping, 25th June
item.description:
The problem is that twenty five empty cans of Strongbow, an old suitcase, piles of assorted clothes and a copy of an early Jeffrey Archer novel are really making the corner of the street unsightly. Especially the novel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 210, Venner Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting footpath in Priory Gardens park at bottom by high street full of Geese excrement, 25th June
item.description:
The public footpath in Priory Gardens Orpington by the Lopeto coffee shop and adjacent to the beginning of the high street is absolutely disgusting. The path is covered with geese excrement making it very unpleasant to walk and enjoy the surroundings. This has been the case for a very long time. Can the paths please be cleaned so people can enjoy this lovely area?. Thankyou.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13-15, Carlton Parade, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overturned food waste bin, 25th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sparrow Drive, Poverest, London

item.title: Fridge and rubbish still there, 25th June

item.title: Loads of furniture and rubbish spilling into path, 25th June
item.description:
This is a rubbish area but it's overflowing with furniture mattresses and other rubbish. It's been like this for a few weeks now and now it's encouraging vagrancy and drug taking in the area

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Collent Street, Hackney, London
